model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Did you play any Resident Evil this week?
I sure did. There was a storm nearby and it was raining for the last three days. Perfect weather for staying in my room playing RE. How about you?
I don't like playing scary video games but I did play a little bit. The weather was very stormy here as well, so I decided to stay in and mess around to look for something to play. I like everything but scary games but can't decide on what to play next. Do you have any suggestions?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Recent Activities', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A talks about a recent hunting trip while Speaker B mentions playing video games and trying out Resident Evil VIII.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I just got back from a trip hunting deer.   ### Speaker B: How did it go?  Did you snag a buck? ### Speaker A: Not this time.  It still went good though.  I checked out the conditions for some of the animals living in the area.  What have you been up to? ### Speaker B: I spent all night playing League of Legends.  But after that I bought Resident Evil VIII.  I haven't turned it on yet but I'm looking forward to it.  Usually I wait for a sale but I couldn't resist. ### Speaker A: That's cool.  What is Resident Evil VIII about?   ### Speaker B: It's a horror game.  You're a guy looking for his kidnapped daughter and you have to explore a bunch of eerie locations full of monsters.  I really liked the last one so I'm eager to see if this one is as good. ### Speaker A: Hmm, that could be interesting.  Do you play by yourself or is it a multiplayer online game? ### Speaker B: I just play it by myself.  I turn the lights out and play it late at night by myself so it's as scary as possible.  Do you like horror movies and scary things like that? ### Speaker A: Not really. About the only thing scary that I like is sneaking up on a deer out in the wild!  I play videogames every now and then but they are usually tame, calm ones. ### Speaker B: I understand.  Where do you go to hunt?  Is it your land or someone you know? ### Speaker A: Both actually. Sometimes I hunt on mine or my family's places and sometimes I go to state hunting sites.  You should go next time I go! ### Speaker B: That would be fun!  I've never shot a real gun before though.  Is it hard? ### Speaker A: Have you enjoyed the game Resident Evil VIII ### Speaker B: Yes I have it's a great game! Have you been playing any new games recently?' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Video Games Comparison', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker B shares details about Resident Evil VIII and discusses gaming preferences with Speaker A.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: That's cool.  What is Resident Evil VIII about?   ### Speaker B: It's a horror game.  You're a guy looking for his kidnapped daughter and you have to explore a bunch of eerie locations full of monsters.  I really liked the last one so I'm eager to see if this one is as good. ### Speaker A: Hmm, that could be interesting.  Do you play by yourself or is it a multiplayer online game? ### Speaker B: I just play it by myself.  I turn the lights out and play it late at night by myself so it's as scary as possible.  Do you like horror movies and scary things like that? ### Speaker A: Not really. About the only thing scary that I like is sneaking up on a deer out in the wild!  I play videogames every now and then but they are usually tame, calm ones.' }(3) {'Related Topics': 'Future Plans and Gaming Session', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B arrange to meet up for a gaming session to try out different games together.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: I think I will enjoy hunting too, it seems like a very peaceful activity and a great way to enjoy nature! What are you up to the rest of the day? ### Speaker A: I managed to shoot a deer on my last hunting trip! It was a big buck. I am having some trouble with my gun though so I have to take it to get looked at before I can teach you how to hunt.  ### Speaker B: Oh, yeah. That seems like a critical park of hunting. How long do you expect it to take? ### Speaker A: Probably less than two hours. I just have to bring it to the shop and ask for some help. I heard you are interested in trying the Jurassic Park game.  ### Speaker B: I definitely am. How are you enjoying it? ### Speaker A: It's great. Very nice open world game. Only downside is that there is no multiplayer and the graphics are a bit outdated. You should come over some time and play ### Speaker B: I'd be down for that. Any time in the next couple of weeks? ### Speaker A: For sure. I'm a little busy this week so how about next week friday after work. Say 6pm? ### Speaker B: That would be great. Should we order in? Pizza? Chinese?  ### Speaker A: Pizza sound greats. Since you're trying out the jurassic park game I'll try out resident evil although it may take some bravery ### Speaker B: Well, yeah, it is definitely scary. Have you played any RE games? ### Speaker A: Nah, I've been to scared to play by myself so if you're with me I'd be down. Anything I should know before playing?' }
```

OUTPUT:
Brief explanation: The DIALOGUE CONTEXT involves Speaker A asking for game suggestions from Speaker B after stating a dislike for scary games. The MEMORY contains information about gaming preferences and experiences with specific games like Resident Evil VIII, as well as discussions about other non-horror games such as the Jurassic Park game.
